column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=FM :
#Text=This was a piece that the Times only quoted one stanza , but it 's about preparation for a battle , and being prepared to either rise to the occasion , or go down :
#Text=Do you know what it 's like to be chased by the Ghost of Failure while staring through Victory 's door ?
#Text=Of course you do , you 're a Mets fan caught in a do-or-die moment in late September at Shea

#Text=As one that 's battled hard through many a broken dream Let me say , " in order to rise to the occasion you must be willing to go down with the ship " , Have no fear , no hesitation , for Winning shall be it 's reward !
#Text=Do n't let them get in your head ! you 've kept it up this long You 're a Mets fan in late September and you 'll fight til the glorious end
#Text=Cheer the team today ; ( your boys in orange and blue ) Let them hear you shout as they fight for what 's mightily due
#Text=( copyright Frank Messina ; reprinted with permission )
#Text=DS :
#Text=Sports fans are n't known as patrons of poetry .
#Text=Have you had interaction with ' new readers ' through your Mets work ?
#Text=FM : This one person who I never met took a picture of me and sent it to me in an e-mail .

#Text=The e-mail said , ' Frank , I have never bothered you during the game , but I just wanted to say thank you for your work and thank you for making some sense of the successes and failures and I wish you much success with your work . '
#Text=Last year in my section at the stadium I had a banner that read We Know ' .
#Text=That 's all it said .
#Text=Then earlier this year these shirts started to come out that said , " Poet says We Know " .
#Text=It was amazing .
#Text=We did n't use the banner this year , though , because we did n't know .
#Text=The team was n't so far ahead that we knew .
#Text=Last year we just knew we were going to the playoffs ; we knew we were going post-season .
#Text=This year we were n't sure .
#Text=We were walking on eggshells .
#Text=There was a woman , a season ticket holder and a die hard fan .
#Text=She was staggered by the loss last year to the Cardinals .
#Text=Last year she came up to me during one of the games late in the season ; she was so happy we were going to the post season .
#Text=By that point we had clinched it .
#Text=She handed me a shirt she bought at the stadium and she gave me a big hug .
#Text=With tears in her eyes she said , " Thank you , Mets Poet , thank you .
